[vc_row center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628656606088{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”WE CONVERT CONTAINERS INTO CHARMING LIVABLE SPACES” font_container=”tag:h3|font_size:24px|text_align:center|color:%23000000|line_height:34px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628656482952{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”cntconvert”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

BOX HUB provides best-in-class container conversion and modification. Our professional team includes Architects, AutoCAD technician, Skilled labors. We use advanced prefabrication methods for converting containers.

A shipping container can be used as a builderâ€™s site store, studio space or even rooms in a hotel â€“ you come up with the idea and let us make it a reality for you!

Shipping Containers really are versatile units. They are strong, secure and weather- tight, making their applications almost endless.

At BoxHub, we help you realize your dream shipping container project from designing to paperworks. We have a full-fledged team of architects, engineers, designers, cabinet makers, and lawyers who will work alongside you looking into your specific needs. With our tailor-made shipping container spaces, we aim to reduce our carbon footprint and pave the way for a green planet. Come join us in this mission and help sustain the environment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”314″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” center_row=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628656586543{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f4f4f4 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Conversion projects we’ve undertaken include:” font_container=”tag:h4|text_align:left” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1628563607102{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
